description:
Rose Rouge Eau De Parfum - A Captivating Floral Masterpiece

Experience the timeless allure of Rose Rouge Eau De Parfum, a sophisticated Arabic perfume that captures the essence of luxurious rose fragrance in its most enchanting form. This exquisite 75ml creation has quickly become one of our best sellers for its remarkable blend of depth and elegance. âœ¨

The Essence of Rose Rouge

The Rose Rouge fragrance opens with a breathtaking burst of fresh floral notes, where the legendary Damascus Rose takes center stage. This isn't just any rose perfume - it's a sophisticated journey through the most precious varieties of this timeless flower. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 75ml
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration High
Brand Rose Rouge

A Symphony of Luxurious Rose Notes

What makes Rose Rouge EDP truly exceptional is its masterful composition of fragrance notes that evolve beautifully throughout the day. The floral richness is balanced with subtle woody undertones, creating a signature scent that's both distinctive and versatile. ðŸ’«

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Damascus Rose, Bergamot, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes Bulgarian Rose, Peony, Jasmine
Base Notes Amber, Sandalwood, Musk, Vanilla

Key Features of Rose Rouge Eau De Parfum

  • ðŸŒ¿ Crafted with premium rose extracts from the finest sources worldwide
  • ðŸ’Ž Exceptional longevity that lasts throughout the day and into the evening
  • ðŸ”¥ Moderate to strong sillage that leaves a memorable impression
  • âœ¨ Elegant bottle design that makes a stunning addition to any collection
  • ðŸŒ¸ Versatile fragrance suitable for both casual and formal occasions

Part of our new arrival collection, Rose Rouge draws inspiration from the ancient art of Middle Eastern perfumery, where rose has been treasured for centuries for its complex character and symbolic significance. This contemporary interpretation honors those traditions while introducing innovative accords that appeal to the modern fragrance connoisseur.

If you enjoy the distinctive character of Rose Rouge, you might also appreciate the opulent oriental notes found in our exclusive Damou Al Dahab EDP with its complementary profile.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Rose Rouge Eau De Parfum last on skin?
Rose Rouge EDP offers exceptional longevity of 8-10 hours on average, thanks to its high-quality concentration and premium ingredients. The initial rose burst gradually settles into a warm amber and sandalwood base that remains detectable until the end of the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin.

Elevate your fragrance collection with Rose Rouge Eau De Parfum - where timeless elegance meets contemporary sophistication in a bottle. ðŸ’«
short_description: Discover Rose Rouge Eau De Parfum, a luxurious blend of Damascus and Bulgarian roses enhanced with jasmine and peony, settling into a warm base of amber and sandalwood. This captivating 75ml fragrance offers exceptional longevity and sillage for the discerning perfume lover.
